title: Order relative to authorizing the joint committee on Tourism, Arts and Cultural Development to make an investigation and study of a certain current Senate document relative to the renaming of the Roslindale Branch of the Boston Public Library to honor Mary McGrory

abstracts.abstract: Senate, November 24, 2025 -- The committee on Tourism, Arts and Cultural Development, to whom was referred the petitions (accompanied by bill, Senate, No. 2338) of Michael F. Rush for legislation to name the Roslindale Branch of the Boston Public Library as the McGrory- Roslindale Branch of the Boston Public Library, report the accompanying Order (Senate, No. 2748).

actions.description: Reported from the committee on Tourism, Arts and Cultural Development
Order reported favorably by committee and referred to the committee on Rules of the two branches, acting concurrently

related_entities.name: the committee on Rules of the two branches, acting concurrently
committee on Rules of the two branches, acting concurrently

actions.description: Discharged to the committee on Senate Rules
